definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: In the perspective of time series, shares of foreign investment in most subordinate industry fluctuate remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 从时间趋势看，多数行业中外资份额呈明显波动状态。

sentences.english: This is smaller than the share of the UK in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 这比起在全球经济中英联邦所占的份额来还要少一些。

sentences.english: Will DuPont's strategy enable meaningful market share recovery?
sentences.chinese: 杜邦的玉米种分销战略能够恢复其市场份额吗？

sentences.english: In the internationalcapital market, the share of Chinese mining is very rare.
sentences.chinese: 在国际资本市场上，中国矿业所占的份额很少。

sentences.english: We have a lot more to win.
sentences.chinese: 我们要赢得更多的市场份额。

sentences.english: Budweiser is now a wholesale channel in Tianjin have occupied 90% of the share.
sentences.chinese: 现在百威在天津量贩式渠道已经占据了90%的份额。

sentences.english: What percentage of your professional services is subcontracted to others?
sentences.chinese: 投保人分出该业务的份额是多少？

sentences.english: BP thinks both Anadarko and Mitsui should pay their share.
sentences.chinese: BP认为阿纳达科和三井应该承担各自份额。

sentences.english: The 10% share has gone from 35 to 48.
The company quickly established itself as a market-share heavyweight.
sentences.chinese: 苹果很快展示了它占据大量市场份额的潜力。

sentences.english: Ubuntu, in its quest for marketshare, has followed the same method.
sentences.chinese: 在探索她的市埸份额时，跟随了同样的方法。

sentences.english: We think your offer is not favorable for us to increase the market share on our end.
sentences.chinese: 你方报价不利于增大我们这里的市厂份额。

sentences.english: The market value of some tranches has slumped to less than ten cents on the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 以美元计，一些份额市值已降至不足十美分。

sentences.english: In both cases, the remainder would go to the book's publishers.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种情况下，其余的份额将归于图书的出版商。

sentences.english: This document spells out who gets what from your estate.
sentences.chinese: 这个文件阐述了谁会从你的财产中拿到多少份额。

sentences.english: It may yet lose the war for market share.
sentences.chinese: 但该公司仍有可能在争夺市场份额的大战中落败。

definition: market share/abbr. for 市場佔有率|市场占有率
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
ability to have one's say and be listened to/influence/clout
